Merge pull request #131 from sbtinstruments/fix-off-by-one

Fix off-by-one in ioctl_EVIOCG_bits

commit.message:
Fix off-by-one in ioctl_EVIOCG_bits

This bug caused values at the end of the list to not be reported back.

Example: On my system, SW_PEN_INSERTED (0x0f) is the last switch constant. That is,
SW_MAX=SW_PEN_INSERTED. Other tools (python-libevdev) correctly reported this switch
as 'set' but python-evdev did not. This commit fixes this issue.
Fix set_absinfo to allow setting parameters to zero
Fix links in documentation
Bump version: 1.2.0 -> 1.3.0
Add input properties to output of evtest
Rename get_absinfo() to absinfo() for consistency with the other poorly named methods
Call loop.remove_reader() when InputDevice is closed
Minor changes to docstrings

Expose get/set absinfo ioctl commands

Changing AbsInfo data in kernel is useful for setting min/max
calibration for other programs and flatness/fuzz settings are
useful for kernel side filtering of input events
Add the allow_unknown argument to KeyEvent

Handle unknown keys

Add to the `keys` dictionary when an unknown key is pressed.

Rework input props functionality

- Merged geniprops into genecodes and reverted the changes to setup.py.
- Renamed InputDevice.props to InputDevice.input_props.
- Renamed UInput(props=) to UInput(input_props=).
Functionality to set device properties eg. INPUT_PROP_DIRECT or INPUT_PROP_POINTER

commit.message: Bump version: 1.1.2 -> 1.2.0
Remove dead code
Add comments and remove extra newlines
Removed uncecessary duplicated ioctl-call

Add UInput support for the resolution parameter in AbsInfo

Creating a UInput device always ignored the resolution parameter since the c implementation was old for current linux kernels.

Merge pull request #100 from whot/master

Coverity fixes

commit.message:
uinput: avoid possible unterminated string.

This is a false positive because the kernel does the right thing and takes
UINPUT_MAX_NAME_SIZE into account. But this shuts up coverity and other static
analyzers so I think we can live with a 79 character restriction instead of
80.

Also change to use sizeof(), not that it really makes a difference but it
allows for the array size to be changed while leaving the constant as-is,
impossible as that is.

input: fix ioctl return value handling()

If any of those ioctls fail, the returned data is undefined.
input: fix unintended fallthrough
